search_string.description: Search string to filter businesses by name or other text fields

business_type.description: Type of business to filter by

startup_certificate.description: Filter by startup certificate status (1 for yes, 0 for no)

invite_start_date.description: Start date for invitation period filter

invite_end_date.description: End date for invitation period filter

services_id.description: List of service IDs to filter by

deal_labels_id.description: List of deal label IDs to filter by

accounting_responsibles_id.description: List of accounting responsible IDs to filter by

min_accounting_service_months.description: Minimum number of accounting service months

max_accounting_service_months.description: Maximum number of accounting service months

min_tickets_to_process.description: Minimum number of tickets to process

max_tickets_to_process.description: Maximum number of tickets to process

business_categories_id.description: List of business category IDs to filter by

request.description:
<llm-instruction>This part of the input schema is truncated. If you want to pass the property `request` to the tool, first call the tool `expandSchema` with "/properties/request" in the list of pointers. This will return the expanded input schema which you can then use in the tool call. You may have to call `expandSchema` multiple times if the schema is nested.</llm-instruction>
<property-description>Additional filtering criteria</property-description>
